hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) offered expiation of a Sa' of dates, and he enjoined the people to do likewise. Whoever does not have that (must give) half a Sa' of wheat

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يُطْعِمُ فِي كَفَّارَةِ الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: How much food should be given when atoning for what one swore about?
